4.1 Limitations
It is acknowledged that there are several limitations to this review. Firstly, NCDs evolve and become evident over 
many years and the risk of bias due to confounding factors is therefore appreciable in the existing evidence 
base [49]. The magnitude of the effects of specific nutrients and their complex interactions involved in the 
epigenetic programming of NCDs and the specific underlying cellular and molecular me
